dct_title_s: Palestine with the Hauran and the adjacent districts
dct_description_sm: by W. Hughes ; published under the superintendence of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge ; Robinson, Burckhardt, Jacotin, &c.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes descriptive text and a legend: Table of elevations, &c.
